events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product does not match the description, and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been classified under the refund category due to the customer's request for money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund, and I am here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and a few photos of the product you received to help us process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached three photos showing how the product I received is different from the listing.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and assistance with the refund. Thank you very much!
The refund has been successfully processed and you should see the amount back on your payment method shortly.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to ask if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund process is completed and you have no further concerns, we are closing this support case.
